message.body: Grace I need a SUPER favor I'm going to jprom on Friday and can't find a dress ANYWHERE and ive been doing a lot of facebook stalking is that hot pink dress you wore to jprom yours/can I borrow it????? HAAAAALP
Omg of course! It's at my house just let me know when you're going to pick it up and ill tell my mom!
You are an angel thank you thank you thank you. Is 6 tonight okay?
I'm sorry meant to tell you yes 6 is fine!
Yay it fits very well!! You are the absolute best
Yay! I should really start a prom rental business....all my dresses are being worn at strath haven proms this year
Haha so glad you're being represented/this is what happens when you have good taste in prom dresses
